achievements: Considered one of the greatest and most influential filmmakers of all time.
Directed acclaimed films such as "2001: A Space Odyssey", "A Clockwork Orange", and "The Shining".
Known for his controversial obedience experiments which explored the extent to which individuals would obey authority figures.
Nominated for an Academy Award for Best Supporting Actor in 'The Lovely Bones'
Known for his versatility and roles in films such as 'Big Night', 'Julie & Julia', and the 'Hunger Games' franchise
